name: Wolf Bonus Casino - Free Vegas Slots Casino Games
name_original: Wolf Bonus Casino - Free Vegas Slots Casino Games
description:
Wolf Bonus Casino invites you to join the pack in chasing BIG WINS and HUGE jackpots.

***Featuring:***

* REAL Vegas slots!
* HUGE Jackpots!
* FREE Bonus Coins!
* NEW slots all the time!
* VIP Perks!
* BIG Wins!
* FANTASTIC graphics!

***More About Wolf Bonus Casino***

When the full moon rises, so does your luck! Wolf Bonus Casino features all the great slot play you want, with VIP Vegas action that will leave you howling!

Wolf Bonus Casino has slot machines that are beautiful AND fun! Many have great BONUS GAMES and FREE SPINS that add to the excitement. Plus, we add new machines all the time!

Looking for that real VIP casino experience? Wolf Bonus Casino has authentic machine play and VIP perks that level up as you do!

You’ll also get thousands of FREE coins every day with the BONUSES just for playing! Use them to play your way to Big, Mega and EPIC Wins!

Wolf Bonus Casino awaits! Join the pack NOW and get ready to SPIN, WIN and have an AMAZING time!

We want your feedback so that we can make this game the best it can be for you! If you have any questions or queries, email us at bonuscasinosupport@foxcubgames.com

This game is targeted for an adult audience (21+). This game does not offer "real money gambling" or an opportunity to win real money or prizes. Practice or success at this game does not imply future success at "real money gambling".
